main-stack-size.help: value of main stack size in bytes

network-interface.help: options are ETHERNET, WIFI_ESP8266, WIFI_ODIN, WIFI_RTW, MESH_LOWPAN_ND, MESH_THREAD, CELLULAR_ONBOARD

bg96_debug.help: enable or disable WNC debug messages.

bg96-debug-setting.help: bit value 1 and/or 2 enable WncController debug output, bit value 4 enables mbed driver debug output. 0x84 to turn on
